item.title: Opendistro ELasticserach sync
item.description: Overview I have recently published a command line tool GitHub to sync and create Kibana object configs from a given open distro elk cluster - see below the help section. This tool assumes that the Kibana cluster holds the source of the truth in relation to the configuration files. The sole purpose of this tool is to be run periodically in a given CI pipeline to sync these configuration files with the a given Git repository.
